Location: Mumbai HO

Req ID: R-1171037

Overview

We are seeking a highly skilled Data Scientist to join our E-commerce FMCG team. This role is pivotal in leveraging data-driven insights to optimize supply chain, customer experience, and commercial performance. The Data Scientist will work closely with cross-functional teams to design predictive models, analyse consumer behaviour, and unlock opportunities that drive growth in the fast-paced FMCG e-commerce environment.

Key Responsibilities

  • Data Analysis & Insights: Collect, clean, and analyse large datasets from multiple sources (sales, supply chain, customer behaviour) to generate actionable insights.

  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Partner with E-commerce, Supply Planning, Customer Operations, and IT teams to deliver scalable data solutions.
  • Innovation & Capability Building: Stay updated with industry trends, tools, and techniques to continuously enhance analytics capabilities.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s/master’s degree in data science, Statistics, Computer Science, or related field
  • 3–5 years of experience in data science, preferably in FMCG or e-commerce
  • Strong proficiency in Python/R, SQL, and data visualization tools (Power BI, Tableau, etc.)
  • Experience with machine learning frameworks
  • Solid understanding of supply chain, retail, or FMCG business models
  • Excellent problem-solving, communication, and stakeholder management skills

Role Overview:

We are seeking a data-driven Marketing Analyst to drive growth and performance for Airtel Finance’s products. Collaborating with cross-functional teams, the Analyst will design contextual targeting strategies, run experiments, and analyse performance to meet aggressive growth targets. This position is ideal for someone with strong analytical skills, technical expertise, and a passion for driving impactful marketing outcomes.

o Support user acquisition, engagement, and retention efforts with data-backed insights.

2. Customer Lifecycle Management (CLM) :

o Strategize and implement CLM frameworks to guide customers through the awareness, acquisition, retention, and advocacy phases.

o Use CLM tools to segment customers, create contextual campaigns, and optimize lifecycle touchpoints for maximum impact.

o Continuously refine CLM strategies based on customer behaviour insights and campaign performance.

3. Campaign Analysis and Optimization:

o Use tools like SQL, Python, and CLM to track, evaluate, and improve marketing campaign performance.

o Conduct A/B testing and experiment with campaign elements to optimize key metrics like CAC and conversion rates.

4. Cross-Functional Collaboration:

o Collaborate with Brand, Marketing and Product teams to align on strategies and execution.

o Provide actionable insights that influence decision-making across the marketing funnel.

5. Growth Program Support:

o Assist in designing and evaluating marketing programs for cross-sell, upsell, and retention.

o Ensure a customer-centric approach in all initiatives to drive long-term satisfaction.

6. Market and Competitor Analysis:

o Research market trends and competitors to identify growth opportunities and areas for differentiation.

7. Continuous Improvement:

o Innovate marketing models and campaigns using insights from data analysis and industry trends.


Skills & Experience Required:

· Experience:

o 2-3 years of experience in marketing analytics, data analysis or related roles.

o Demonstrated experience in owning the performance of marketing initiatives, driving growth, and optimizing business metrics.

· Skills:

o Proficient in SQL and Python for querying, analysing, and visualizing large datasets.

o Experience in Customer Lifecycle Management (CLM), including strategizing and implementing lifecycle campaigns to drive customer acquisition, retention, and engagement.

o Expertise in A/B testing, multivariate testing, and optimizing marketing campaigns across various channels.

o Strong proficiency in building and refining customer segmentation and targeting models to enhance campaign effectiveness.

o Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with a collaborative mindset for working with cross-functional teams.

o Strong understanding of key marketing metrics such as CAC (Customer Acquisition Cost), conversion rates, and engagement metrics.

o Excellent problem-solving skills with a focus on improving marketing performance and driving impactful results.


Why Airtel Finance?

· Impactful Work: Play a pivotal role in driving the growth of Airtel Finance by influencing user engagement, acquisition, and retention across multiple products.

· Innovative Environment: Thrive in a dynamic, high-impact space where creativity and experimentation are key to achieving business results.

· Career Growth: The role offers significant opportunities for personal and professional development, with exposure to diverse products and cross-functional teams.

· Collaborative Culture: Join a data-driven, fast-paced team focused on innovation and scaling new growth strategies.


If you're passionate about driving growth through data and creativity, we'd love to have you on board to help us scale Airtel Finance to new heights!!

The Project Coordinator will support the end-to-end execution of renewable energy projects by ensuring effective planning, scheduling, documentation, and cross-functional coordination. The role requires strong project management skills, advanced proficiency in Primavera (P6) or MS Projects, and the ability to manage detailed project controls for large-scale engineering and EPC projects.

Project Planning & Scheduling

  • Support the Project Manager in preparing project execution strategies and plans.

Project Coordination & Tracking

  • Coordinate with engineering, procurement, construction, site teams, and external stakeholders.
  • Maintain action trackers, risk registers, and milestone dashboards.
  • Ensure timely follow-up and closure of tasks to keep projects on track.

Reporting & Documentation

  • Prepare weekly and monthly project progress reports, dashboards, MIS, and presentations.

  • Facilitate data-driven decision-making for project leadership.

Project Controls & Compliance

  • Assist in monitoring budgets, resource plans, and cost implications.
  • Ensure compliance with HSE, quality, and project governance frameworks.
  • Identify risks and prepare mitigation plans in coordination with the project team.

Qualifications & Experience

  • Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (preferred) or related field.
  • 12+ years of experience in project coordination within Renewables, EPC, Infrastructure, or Oil & Gas.
  • Strong hands-on experience with Primavera P6 and/or MS Projects.
  • Excellent analytical, planning, and communication skills.
  • Proficiency in MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint), reporting tools, and documentation practices.
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with tight project timelines.

Every internship at Stripe centers around a real, legitimate project that our customers urgently need, touching many parts of our operations and stack. We will support you in shipping it. As a Stripe intern, you'll be tackling important projects to increase global commerce, while working alongside exceptional people who insist on doing their best work. You’ll learn from people with high standards who are great at inspiring others to do more and go further.   • Give and receive technical feedback through code reviews or design discussions
  • Collaborate with other engineers and cross-functional stakeholders to proactively seek and incorporate feedback
  • Learn quickly by asking great questions, by working with your intern manager and teammates effectively, and by communicating the status of your work clearly


Who you are

We’re looking for someone who meets the minimum requirements to be considered for the role. If you meet these requirements, you are encouraged to apply. The preferred qualifications are a bonus, not a requirement.

Minimum Requirements

  • A strong fundamental understanding of computer science through pursuit of a Bachelor’s, Master’s, or PhD degree in computer science, math, or a related discipline
  • Some experience and familiarity with programming, either through side projects or classwork. We work mostly in Java, Ruby, JavaScript, Scala, and Go. We believe new programming languages can be learned if the fundamentals and general knowledge are present
  • Experience from previous internships or other multi-person projects, including open source contributions, that demonstrate evaluating and receiving feedback from mentors, peers, and stakeholders
  • Ability to learn unfamiliar systems and form an understanding of those systems, through independent research and working with a mentor and subject matter experts


Preferred Qualifications

  • At least 2 years of university education, or equivalent work experience
  • One or more areas of specialized knowledge balanced with general skills and knowledge, such as knowing more frontend technologies and, at a high level, how a service handles an HTTP request
  • Understanding and some experience writing high quality pull requests, with good test coverage, and working knowledge to complete projects with minimal defects
  • Familiarity with navigating and managing your work in new code bases, with multiple languages
  • Ability to write clearly to explain your work to stakeholders, team members, and other Stripes

Also, some teams have greater in-office attendance requirements, to appropriately support our users and workflows, which the hiring manager will discuss. This approach helps strike a balance between bringing people together for in-person collaboration and learning from each other, while supporting flexibility when possible.

Pay and benefits

Stripe does not yet include pay ranges in job postings in every country. Stripe strongly values pay transparency and is working toward pay transparency globally.
